Title: 17th Host Country
Body: Russia is the seventeenth country to host the FIFA World Cup in the competition's twenty-one tournaments history since the inaugural World Cup in 1930.

Title: Russia's First
Body: This is the first FIFA World Cup tournament taking place in Russia (as well as in Eastern Europe), and in two continents (due to Russia's vast land area), Europe and Asia.

Title: Brand New Stadiums
Body: Most of the matches of FIFA World Cup will be held on brand new stadiums specially built for this tournament. Five or more stadiums never existed five years prior to the opening match day.

Title: Fan ID
Body: This is the first FIFA World Cup where all spectators are required to apply and obtain a Fan ID in addition with the ticket in order to attend a match. The Fan ID does offer a number of other bonuses.
